editorialSummary.text: Relaxed rooms & suites in a contemporary business hotel featuring free breakfast & a restaurant.

text.text:
Extremely poor experience. The bathroom facilities are pathetic - unclean, badly maintained, and worst of all, they don't even allow proper usage. I came all the way from another city for an important interview, trusting the hotel to at least provide basic support. But what I got was zero hygiene, zero empathy, and a completely careless attitude.

How can a hotel deny someone proper access to a washroom, especially when they've travelled from far and need to freshen up before a big interview? It’s inhuman and totally unprofessional.

If you're coming from outside and depending on this hotel for basic comfort—think twice. This place seriously needs to upgrade both its facilities and attitude. Worst hospitality I’ve ever experienced.

Terrible Customer Service – Rude Receptionist Ruined the Experience

I traveled from Delhi to Lucknow for a function and booked this hotel just for a quick rest and refreshment. Unfortunately, the experience was far from relaxing. The person at the reception desk was extremely rude, unprofessional, and clearly lacked basic customer service skills.

Instead of being welcomed, I felt disrespected and uncomfortable. For anyone coming from out of town, this kind of behavior is the last thing you'd expect. I strongly do not recommend this hotel if you’re looking for even the minimum level of hospitality.

text.text:
I had a great experience staying at Hotel Arif Castle, Lucknow. It’s an excellent choice for both family vacations and corporate travelers. The hotel offers a comfortable and welcoming environment with all the necessary amenities.

The location is ideal, making it easy to access key areas of the city. The breakfast and dinner options were impressive – both in terms of variety and quality.

A special mention to Vaishnavi, who was extremely cooperative, helpful, and always ready to assist with any issues or queries. Her professional and courteous attitude really enhanced the overall experience.

Highly recommended for anyone looking for a pleasant and hassle-free stay in Lucknow!

text.text:
Centrum, Lucknow is not just a hotel—it’s an experience.

As part of my professional duties, I travel extensively—almost half the month. While India is home to many remarkable properties in the hospitality space, Centrum stands apart. The thought, design, construction, and overall experience are truly novel.

From what I could gather, the architecture beautifully blends stone, wood, and metal, creating an ambiance that is earthy, humble, and yet grand. The staff is exceptionally friendly, the food is thoughtfully curated, and every detail reflects a deep sense of care.

A wonderful property—superbly designed. I would love to return.

1-I have booked 12 rooms at hotel and one hall for function.
2-Reception Manager was asking us that he will not allow any guest without proper I’d proof. We told us we have booked 12 room so you can take my I’d proof Pl don’t insult my guest . After long discussion manager agreed.
2- There was lunch in function so it is understood that guest will start to come at 12 so hall should be ready at 11 AM with proper AC etc. but manager has started AC at 2 PM all the guest has arrived at 12 PM and he has closed AC at 9 PM however we are at hall.
3-No sense of humour of guest . Staff are so careless . They were even not served the starter after Muriel’s reminder to manager and waiters.
4-Dinner and lunch manager was very cunning they have instructed to waiter to not serve anything. Tell to guest come and take starter.
5Nushell don’t even think to do any function at This hotel. This worst Management ever seen in my life

text.text:
The Golden Orchid is ideally situated in a prime area, offering easy access to local attractions, dining, and shopping spots. Whether you're exploring on foot or using public transport, the location makes it convenient to get around, making it a great choice for both leisure and business travelers.

Rooms:
The rooms at the Golden Orchid are spacious, well-designed, and thoughtfully equipped with modern amenities. The decor reflects a blend of comfort and elegance, with cozy beds and quality linens that ensure a good night's sleep. Rooms also feature essentials like a minibar, ample storage, and a work desk. The cleanliness is notable, and the views from the windows (especially in higher-floor rooms) add to the pleasant experience.
But I am very sad for this that is service is not good pls I request you to resolve the your service problem otherwise hotel is very good 😊

Had a scary and unsettling experience—strange messages appeared on the TV screen late at night in two different rooms. It felt like the screens were being remotely accessed. I felt unsafe, spent the night in the lobby, and checked out the next morning, mentally disturbed.

Despite reporting everything, there was no real support from the front desk. They denied help with luggage and refused any refund for the unused night. Extremely disappointed with the lack of empathy and basic assistance. Not recommended.

DO NOT COME
Had the worst experience staying at this property. Currently writing the review from the property. Denied food after promising it at late night - my flight got very delayed and hence I reached hotel post midnight. My colleagues who were already staying there, had already informed and were assured food will be available. My client who had booked the room had also communicated to make arrangements. Still when it came to it, they denied saying we don’t have this available now and that available now.
Besides this, the bed linen is stained, the shower blinds have black mould/fungus growing on it, the overall cleanliness and hygiene of the room is terrible, and is the hotel’s. Mosquitoes swarming all around the reception ane room corridors. Lifts sway and churn while moving which is very scary.
The staff’s rudeness and unwillingness to understand is another jewel in their crown.
DEFINITELY WOULD NOT RECOMMEND.

Denied food after promising it at late night - my flight got very delayed and hence I reached hotel post midnight. My colleagues who were already staying there, had already informed and were assured food will be available. My client who had booked the room had also communicated to make arrangements. Still when it came to it, they denied saying we don’t have this available now and that available now.
Besides this, the bed linen is stained, the shower blinds have black mould/fungus growing on it, the overall cleanliness and hygiene of the room is terrible, and is the hotel’s. Mosquitoes swarming all around the reception ane room corridors. Lifts sway and churn while moving which is very scary.
The staff’s rudeness and unwillingness to understand is another jewel in their crown.
DEFINITELY WOULD NOT RECOMMEND.

text.text: I booked 18 rooms for 38 adults on our stay at All Seasons in Lucknow during the peak of summers on 27 June 2025. I must say that the rooms were in excellent condition, neat and tidy. Washrooms were absolutely perfect, no leaking taps or smell. The air conditioning in the rooms and the buffet area was perfect. We had breakfast and lunch and I must appreciate that all veg and non veg dishes were perfectly made and were real tasty. Staff promptness in attending guests requirements was impeccable. Hats off to Mr. Varun of All Seasons, who delivered more than 100% of what he had committed me over phone calls when I was making the booking. All my relatives who were travelling with me were very happy with the services provided and I didn’t receive a single complaint from anyone, hence I couldn’t stop myself from writing this sweet review about Hotel All Season. Thanks Varun ji for delivering what you promised on phone and all the best to your entire team who I must say was very well trained and polite. A special thanks to the chef who made sumptuous omlettes for us and made sure that these were served hot in our plates.

I stayed  2nd time in this hotel.
1st stay was good and liked that hence decided to stay 2nd time with my elderly  parents (both 70+).
After paying the high paid terrif of the room we entered the room and settled.
It was dec end , cold .
After some time, the receptionist called me and told to come down since there is some emergency. I went down. It was after 9 pm now. He told me to shift to a near by property as they have got some one else to give this room. He said he is requesting but it was similar to forcing me to vacant and move to a near by property with my elderly parents in winter of dec end. Can u believe this ? coz there was no other room available for that special ppl in that property.
I had no way except totally rejecting it when I felt they are forcing me and not trying to understand.
They totally forgot the hospitality industry rules, first come first served.

So be careful before doing booking and also after checking in this hotel.

text.text:
A good boutique hotel in LucknowExceptional Experience at ANR Hotel!

I've had the pleasure of staying at ANR Hotel for the past 8 years, and every single visit has been an absolute delight! This hidden gem is conveniently located just a 10-minute walk from Charbagh railway station, making it an ideal choice for travelers.

The hotel's location is also easily accessible, situated at the main Naka Hindola main chauraha, opposite the Police Chowki. Despite being a budget-friendly option, ANR Hotel offers an unparalleled level of service, comfort, and cleanliness that I've never experienced at even some of the top 5-star hotels in Lucknow!

The staff is warm, welcoming, and always willing to go the extra mile to ensure a comfortable stay. The rooms are well-maintained, clean, and equipped with all the necessary amenities.

I've been so impressed with ANR Hotel that I've recommended it to my friends and family, including my family doctor when he visited Lucknow for the first time. Everyone who has stayed here has had a wonderful experience.

A few practical notes: there is a small parking space in the basement, which is perfect for two-wheelers, but I wouldn't recommend bringing a car as the space is limited. Room service is quick and efficient, and the reception is friendly and helpful.

One of the best things about ANR Hotel is its fantastic location. It's almost at the center of the city, making it easy to get to anywhere you want to go. Whether you're in Lucknow for business or pleasure, ANR Hotel is the perfect base.

In short, ANR Hotel is a true gem in the heart of Lucknow. If you're looking for a comfortable, convenient, and affordable place to stay, look no further! I highly recommend ANR Hotel to anyone visiting Lucknow.

text.text:
The Centrum Hotel in Lucknow is more than just a luxury hotel—it's an elegant landmark of modern hospitality nestled in the peaceful and prestigious neighborhood of Sushant Golf City. Spanning across a vast, lush landscape with meticulously maintained lawns and garden spaces, the hotel offers a serene escape from the city's hustle while maintaining seamless connectivity to major city landmarks. Located just off Shaheed Path, The Centrum provides quick access to the Chaudhary Charan Singh International Airport, the Lucknow Railway Station, and major commercial hubs like Gomti Nagar and Hazratganj. It's also in close proximity to renowned destinations like Ekana Cricket Stadium (ideal for sports lovers), Lulu Mall and Phoenix Palassio (for shopping enthusiasts), Medanta Hospital, and educational institutions, making it highly convenient for both leisure and business travelers. The hotel’s standout feature is its expansive layout and architecture—modern yet deeply rooted in Indian elegance—with interiors adorned with tasteful décor, large windows that welcome natural light, and a calm ambiance that reflects luxury at every step.

The Centrum boasts a wide range of accommodation options including Deluxe Rooms, Premium Rooms with balconies, Executive and Junior Suites offering separate living areas, the luxurious Centrum Suite with private lounges and dual bathrooms, and the opulent Centrum Villa that spans 721 sq ft of tailored, garden-facing elegance. All rooms are equipped with smart TVs, high-speed Wi-Fi, mini-bars, centralized AC, plush bedding, and thoughtfully curated furniture, ensuring the highest level of comfort. What truly sets The Centrum apart is its vast array of state-of-the-art facilities. Guests can rejuvenate at the semi-Olympic sized swimming pool, unwind at the full-service spa offering holistic wellness treatments, or work out at the high-tech fitness center with personal trainers available. For sports lovers, there are dedicated tennis and squash courts, a jogging track, and an indoor recreation zone with billiards, table tennis, and board games. For younger guests, there’s a vibrant kids’ play zone and a party area tailored for children’s celebrations. The hotel also features beautifully designed banquet halls, open-air lawns, and conference facilities equipped with modern audio-visual technology, ideal for weddings, corporate retreats, and large events.

Dining is a rich and diverse experience at The Centrum. The hotel hosts a range of culinary venues, including Plum, a multi-cuisine fine-dining restaurant offering everything from Indian delicacies to Japanese, Mediterranean, Italian, and local Awadhi cuisines, and Pendulum Bar, which provides a stylish, cozy space for enjoying premium drinks and handcrafted cocktails. Room service is available 24/7, with chefs happy to customize dishes according to dietary preferences. Additional conveniences include ample and secure parking space, 24-hour concierge and front desk service, electric vehicle charging stations, on-call doctors, business centers, currency exchange, travel desk services, and express laundry and dry cleaning.

Above all, the hotel is known for its incredibly warm, professional, and detail-oriented staff. Guests consistently praise the team for going above and beyond—from quick check-ins and personalized welcome gestures to prompt room service and courteous behavior throughout the stay. The management places great emphasis on guest satisfaction, often checking in personally to ensure comfort, making business travelers, couples, families, and even solo guests feel completely at home. In online reviews across platforms like TripAdvisor, Google, and Yatra, The Centrum maintains an impressive rating (around 4.4/5), with particular praise for its cleanliness, food quality, staff attentiveness, and peaceful atmosphere. In short, The Centrum Hotel is not just a place to stay—it's an experience designed with elegance, comfort, and heartfelt hospitality, making it one of the finest hospitality destinations in Lucknow for travelers who seek excell

text.text:
The Centrum Hotel in Lucknow is a luxury 5-star property located in Sushant Golf City, near Shaheed Path Expressway, offering modern amenities and exceptional service. It is highly rated for its elegant rooms and suites, world-class facilities, and convenient location close to the airport, Lulu Hypermarket, and cultural landmarks.

Key Features:

1.	Accommodation: The hotel offers a variety of rooms, including Deluxe Rooms, Premium Rooms, and luxury suites like The Centrum Villas. Prices range from ₹9,000 to ₹35,000 per night, providing options for different budgets.
2.	Dining: Multiple fine dining options are available, including themed food festivals and special events like the Purvanchal cuisine experience.
3.	Facilities: It features a semi-Olympic swimming pool, squash courts, a gym, and electric vehicle charging stations. The hotel also has dedicated areas for relaxation and recreational activities.
4.	Location: The Centrum is a short drive from Lucknow Airport (20 minutes) and prominent attractions like Ekana Stadium and Ambedkar Park.

Guests praise the hotel for its serene environment, courteous staff, and modern amenities. It is especially popular for family stays and events ￼ ￼.

If you’re looking for a luxurious and peaceful stay in Lucknow, The Centrum stands out as an excellent choice.

text.text:
Cleanliness and design of the room, prompt & polite services, location of hotel, quality of food and above all value for money are the key reasons for my awarding 5 points to Hotel Ginger,Lucknow. The room was not very big but was designed elegantly and was very functional. All my needs were met adequately. The quality of soap, shampoo and conditiiner was excellent. The room decor and lighting were contemporary. The prices of ala carta and buffet meals was far below imagination. The spread of breakfast and main meals was elaborate. I got far more value for money without loosing out on the services with an eternal smile from the staff I connected with. While every one of them was very polite and always smiled, I remember names of a few of them - Ravi, Ms. Iqra, Vijay, Babloo, Kanahiya, Pavan, Ramesh and Anurag. The ones whose names I have not been able to remember were also very good. I did not meet the chefs and the house cleaning staff but they made my stay very pleasant with excellent quality of food and well kept room.
The heating of the room, hot water was just perfect. I got better service than many 5 star hotels I have stayed in the past. I guess the selection and training of staff is far more important than the star category of the hotel. When in Lucknow, I will surely stay here only if they are not full. Well done Hotel Ginger, Lucknow. Keep doing the right things with a lovely smile.
